main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Xenia, Ohio on June 5, 1953. The conclusion was that it was a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting took place for 15 seconds and the witness observed a single unspecified object.
The object was described as a bright light, large, and moving fast across the horizon with flashing white light.
The witness was a civilian and the observation was ground-visual.
The weather conditions at the time included clear sky, no wind, and warm temperature.
The witness was able to provide details about the direction and appearance of the object.
result: prosaic explanation - it was a balloon
